Class ParkingLot

java.lang.Object
Parking.ParkingLot
public class ParkingLot extends Object
Represents a parking lot that manages vehicle entry, exit, and fee calculation. This class provides functionality to add and remove vehicles from the parking lot, track parking status, and calculate fees based on vehicle type and parking duration. The parking lot has a fixed capacity and prevents duplicate vehicle entries.
Since:
2025

  • Constructor Details

    • ParkingLot

      public ParkingLot(int capacity)
      Constructs a new ParkingLot with the specified capacity.
      Parameters:
      capacity - the maximum number of vehicles that can be parked

  • Method Details

    • addVehicle

      public void addVehicle(Vehicle<?> vehicle) throws ParkingException
      Adds a vehicle to the parking lot. This method checks if the parking lot has available capacity and if the vehicle is not already parked. If both conditions are met, the vehicle is added to the parking lot and its entry time is recorded.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - the vehicle to add to the parking lot
      Throws:
      ParkingException - if the parking lot is at capacity or the vehicle is already parked

    • addVehicle

      public void addVehicle(String type, String licensePlate, String state) throws ParkingException
      Adds a vehicle to the parking lot by creating it from type and details. This method creates a vehicle object based on the specified type (car or motorcycle) and then adds it to the parking lot using the addVehicle(Vehicle) method.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of vehicle ("car" or "motorcycle", case-insensitive)
      licensePlate - the vehicle's license plate number
      state - the state where the vehicle is registered
      Throws:
      ParkingException - if the vehicle type is unknown or if parking fails

    • showStatus

      public void showStatus()
      Displays the current status of the parking lot. This method shows the parking lot's capacity, current occupancy, and details about each parked vehicle including how long it has been parked.

    • removeVehicle

      public void removeVehicle(String licensePlate) throws ParkingException
      Removes a vehicle from the parking lot and calculates the parking fee. This method removes the vehicle with the specified license plate from the parking lot and calculates the parking fee based on the vehicle's hourly rate and parking duration.
      Parameters:
      licensePlate - the license plate of the vehicle to remove
      Throws:
      ParkingException - if the vehicle is not found in the parking lot

    • getOccupiedSpaces

      public int getOccupiedSpaces()
      Gets the number of currently occupied parking spaces.
      Returns:
      the number of vehicles currently parked in the lot

    • getCapacity

      public int getCapacity()
      Gets the total capacity of the parking lot.
      Returns:
      the maximum number of vehicles that can be parked

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Checks if the parking lot is at full capacity.
      Returns:
      true if the parking lot is full, false otherwise

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the parking lot is empty.
      Returns:
      true if no vehicles are parked, false otherwise

    • getAvailableSpaces

      public int getAvailableSpaces()
      Gets the number of available parking spaces.
      Returns:
      the number of empty parking spaces

    • listVehicles

      public void listVehicles()
      Lists all parked vehicles showing license plate, state, and vehicle type. This method provides a concise list of vehicles for selection purposes, showing the essential information needed to identify vehicles including their type (Car or Motorcycle).
